record.title: CALLING ON THE GOVERNMENT OF IRAN TO RELEASE DR. HALEH ESFANDIARI
record.chair: The unfinished business is the vote on the motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, H. Res. 430, as amended, on which the yeas and nays were ordered.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.
record.chair: The question is on the motion offered by the gentleman from Tennessee (Mr. Tanner) that the House suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, H. Res. 430, as amended.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 428, had I been present, I would have voted "yea."
